name: lhs-potsdam
description: A new WordPress Boilerplate Theme by Ralf Hortt
author: Ralf Hortt <mail@ralfhortt.dev>

scripts.build: wp-scripts build src/css/app.scss src/css/editor-styles.scss src/js/app.ts src/js/editor-app.ts --output-path=build/assets && wp-scripts build --source-path=src/blocks/ --blocks-manifest --experimental-modules --output-path=build/blocks && npm run build:theme
scripts.start: wp-scripts start --source-path=src/blocks/ --blocks-manifest --experimental-modules --output-path=build/blocks & wp-scripts start src/css/app.scss src/css/editor-styles.scss src/js/app.ts src/js/editor-app.ts --output-path=build/assets & npm run watch:theme
